summary: a handmade version, more realistic and better renderer (maybe or not) with reals  texts and new \'normal map\'. 0% Oblivion style, 100% Skyrim and RolePlay style (v3 coming soon)
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/269/mapv2header.png[/img]


[img]http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/7059/mapv2title.png[/img][/center]
[right][img]http://i47.servimg.com/u/f47/14/97/62/72/ink_0310.png[/img][/right]
[center][img]http://i47.servimg.com/u/f47/14/97/62/72/ink_0210.png[/img][/center]
[color=lightgrey][b]iMPORTANT[/b]: this mod doesn\'t replace \"[i]fast travel[/i]\" map. Sorry for my bad english spoken.[img]http://i47.servimg.com/u/f47/14/97/62/72/ink_0310.png[/img]
As the first one, my second experimentation (not the better,I\'m not really satisfied but I like it) replace the political maps (visibles in the castles for exemples) for \"integrist RolePlayers\" who want a better aspect than the vanilla map (while remaining in the same style). Now, with this, your game will smell like sheep!
[img]http://i47.servimg.com/u/f47/14/97/62/72/ink_0210.png[/img][right][img]http://i47.servimg.com/u/f47/14/97/62/72/ink_0110.png[/img][/right]
[center][img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/2221/mapv2notice.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://i47.servimg.com/u/f47/14/97/62/72/ink_0210.png[/img]
[list][center][img]http://i47.servimg.com/u/f47/14/97/62/72/ink_0110.png[/img][b]CREDiTS & CONTACT[/b][/center]
[*]You can use it in your mod or for personnal usage but please don\'t forget me if you want to distribute or utilize it ..if you are nice,  send me a Christmas turkey ^^ 
[*]More questions, suggestions, financial support, autographs, sentimentals letters, contact me here.. I\'m waiting for feedbacks in case I would continue.[/list]

[list][center][b]SPECiALS THANX for..[/b] [img]http://i47.servimg.com/u/f47/14/97/62/72/ink_0310.png[/img][/center]
[*][i]Bethesda[/i] for [i]Xbox[/i] game version in my PC..
[*]anonymous animal who help me to make this texture (graphics based on a real animal skin, but not mine...just a abandonned cow that roamed the corner..)
[*]for peoples here who saying that I spoke too ^^ I would not say anything, just please use and test..
[*][i]Steam[/i] to make us want to play, [i]Steam[/i] to make us criminals (have a legal DVD copy but..), [i]Steam[/i] for a real time lesson of patience[/list][right][img]http://i47.servimg.com/u/f47/14/97/62/72/ink_0110.png[/img][/right][img]http://i47.servimg.com/u/f47/14/97/62/72/ink_0210.png[/img]
[center][img]http://i47.servimg.com/u/f47/14/97/62/72/ink_0310.png[/img][/center][/color]
